Same as PSYC 385 1
Pre-requisites: Some coursework in Economics (Econ 201 & 212), Neuroscience (NBB 301 & 302) or Psychology ( PSYC 215, 217, 309, or 385) or consent of instructor.
course_description: Study of variable topics of special interest in neuroscience and behavioral biology. May be repeated for credit when topics vary.
